gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 109, Hawks 95
gameRecap.excerpt: Dallas defeats Atlanta, 109-95. For Dallas, Luka Doncic led the way with 25 points (6 3PM), 12 rebounds, eight assists, and two steals while Kyrie Irving finished with 26 points and five rebounds in the victory. Bogdan Bogdanovic recorded 17 points and seven rebounds while Dejounte Murray added 16 points, five rebounds, and four assists for Atlanta in the losing effort. Dallas improves to 46-30, while Atlanta moves to 36-41 in the loss.
